title: Scott Nicholson Library, Vol. 3
description: A boxed set of four novels from a #1 bestselling Kindle author. More than 230,000 words of fantasy, paranormal, and mystery fiction, DRM-free.Includes the complete text  A man's day takes a turn for the cursed when an old woman's touch imposes a price for past mistakes. Written with J.R. Rain.OCTOBER Teen witch Crystal and her dead best friend Bone must stop the world from turning into a bad horror movie.THE DEAD LOVE Private investigator Richard Steele must solve his most difficult case ever--his own murder--while caught between women on both sides of the grave.SPEED DATING WITH THE A paranormal conference at a haunted Appalachian hotel accidentally stirs up demons.---Scott Nicholson is author of more than 20 books, including the bestsellers LIQUID FEAR, THE RED CHURCH, and THE HARVEST. He's also written seven story collections, six screenplays, and three children's books. Look for the other library sets in the series and complete your collection. Visit Nicholson at Author Central."Nicholson is an old-fashioned storyteller, through and through." - Midnight Fantastique"Scott Nicholson is a writer who always surprises and always entertains." - Jonathan Maberry, Author of Rot & Ruin"Scott Nicholson is on his way to the front rank of genre writers, but don't be surprised if he--like Koontz and King before him--becomes a genre unto himself."--Page Horrific
author: Scott Nicholson
